trans-unit.source: $MNS_AUTODISMISS - Menu automatically ends when mouse is outside the menu for approximately 10 seconds

target.mrk: $MNS_AUTODISMISS - Menu automatically ends when mouse is outside the menu for approximately 10 seconds

trans-unit.source: $MNS_CHECKORBMP - The same space is reserved for the check mark and the bitmap

trans-unit.source: $MNS_MODELESS - Menu is modeless; that is, there is no menu modal message loop while the menu is active.
